lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The market was showing limited signs of recovery from the collapse in trading last night and the calmer tone was reinforced this morning as the first significant retail orders for some time emerged, one senior FRN trader noted.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Although a handful of FRN market makers were expected to remain on the sidelines for the time being, dealers noted a tangible return of retail interest from the Far East, lured back by extremely attractive yields and bargain prices.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "We are seeing from Singapore, and from Japan clients keen to use up their quotas for purchase of particular instruments before the end of the fiscal year," the senior trader added.
